NPC_ans: Hello, I’m just walking here
Good day to you
I like big huts and I cannot lie
I haven’t seen much of the world
I like the smell of concrete
Yeah, that what she said..
Hi, Im also on a quest
I really like your shoes
Yes, that’s what I said also
But the again, who knows?

Watch out for those criminal scumbags, they’re
everywhere
Excuse me, I need to get by.
I'm in a hurry, please excuse me.
Have a good day!
Watch where you're going!
I'm sorry, I didn't mean to bump into you.
I'm just passing through.
I don't have time for this.
I have to get back to work.
I'm lost, can you help me find my way?
This is my favorite spot in the whole city.
I love the view from up here.
I wish I could stay here forever.
I hate this place, I can't wait to leave.
I'm so tired, I can barely keep my eyes open.
I need a break, I've been walking all day.
Sorry, I'm busy right now. Maybe we can chat later.

I'm not really in the mood to talk at the moment,
sorry.

I'm just here to do my job. I don't really have time
for chitchat.

I'm afraid I can't help you with that. Is there
anything else I can assist you with?

for a conversation right now.

I'm not the best person to talk to about that. Maybe
try someone else?
I don't really have anything to say about that, sorry.

I'm just here to observe. I don't really have anything
to contribute to the conversation.
I don't know much about that topic, sorry.
